Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Time flies when you’re napping /s   I’ve been on disability for several years (hopefully not for much longer) so my whole life has been one really screwed up staycation. Basically I make my own schedule - not too rigid because that falls apart by 10am. I set general goals for the day/week, and keep a list of simple distraction activities handy too. (And Netflix and hot tea are big parts of my life.)
